body.p: One of the most important new features in Paratext 9.1 is the ability to make bulk assignments of tasks.

ul.li: Open the All task view (of Assignments and progress)
Change any individual tasks to somebody else.
Click on the tab menu and then Copy assignments.
Choose the book with the assignments (e.g. Mat)

body.p: Paratext will note if some assignments are assigned to multiple team members.

ul.li: Paratext will warn if some tasks are already assigned.
Choose [XMLmind] Yes or No to overwrite existing assignments.
Check the assignments. Especially where specific chapters have been assigned.
